extendedInfo.description: Your news for you- Get the latest news from The Intelligencer on your mobile device. The Intelligencer app keeps you in the know with the latest in Local and National news right at your fingertips. Get up to the minute traffic and weather; stay connected with your community and local interests in and around the Bucks/Montgomery county area. Stay current with the local sports scene as well as the Phillies, Eagles, Flyers and Sixers. See a news worthy event? You can upload photos or videos to the Intelligencer.

reviews.title: Zoom Android 4.1.1 update broke app
reviews.comment: Update: August 28 release corrected the problem..    Post install of 4.1.1 this app broke, can\'t click on any articles to read them.  Prior to that it was a good app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bob
reviews.comment: Nice app, easy to use. Love the latest update. The tile/visual look is very easy to use :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Relies on location. When not in town..dumb app tries to localize from where u r.
reviews.author: A Google User
